nrel.dev.api
text: first step register NREL’s Network request API credentials. registration, key sent provided email address. email address key used credentials access NREL’s data-sets.

title: nrel.dev.api
text: email address API key can stored home folder system loaded package next time. procedure run every system unless credentials changed.
code: library(nrel.dev.api) set_nrel_api_key(nrel.api.email = "YOUR_EMAIL",                   nrel.api.key = "YOUR_NREL_API_KEY") # retrieve the credentials x <- get_nrel_api_email() x get_nrel_api_key(invisible = FALSE)

what: R package to access data from National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) developer network
title: R package to access data from National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) developer network
text: R package access data National Renewable Energy Lab (NREL) developer network.   goal nrel.dev.api provide R-native access NREL’s renewable energy sources data-sets using NREL Developer Network API.

title: R package to access data from National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) developer network
text: can install development version nrel.dev.api GitHub :

title: R package to access data from National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) developer network
text: Register https://developer.nrel.gov/ get API key email address.
code: library(nrel.dev.api)  # to save your credentials (do once) set_nrel_api_key(nrel.api.email = "YOUR_EMAIL", nrel.api.key = "YOUR_NREL_API_KEY") # to retrieve x <- get_nrel_api_email() x get_nrel_api_key(invisible = FALSE) # get url address by the dataset name get_nrel_url("india-wind")  # fetch/download the data x <- fetch_nrel_data(   lon = 75.36621, lat = 24.72687,   api_url = get_nrel_url("india-wind"),   attributes = "windspeed_40m,windspeed_80m,windspeed_100m,windspeed_120m",   interval = 15,   names = "2014") x

code: guess_nrel_grid(   gis_sf,   dx = 0.01,   dy = 0.01,   q_atributes = "windspeed_100m",   collection = "wtk",   q_interval = 60,   q_names = "2014",   steps_max = 10,   verbose = T )

title: Guess grid with locations of data-points in NREL's collection — guess_nrel_grid
text: gis_sf sf object (map) region estimate number data-points NREL's collection, coordinates (grid). dx starting step along longitude dy starting step along latitude q_atributes attributes query (see fetch_nrel_data) collection name NREL's data-collection (see get_nrel_url) q_interval interval parameter query q_names names parameter query steps_max maximum steps evaluation grid along axis, 10 default verbose logical, process reported
